tr.td: Combined calcium and vitamin D3 preparation contraindicated (situation)
Administration of drug or medicament contraindicated (situation)
Doctor stopped drugs - medical aim achieved (situation)
Cardiopulmonary resuscitation discontinued due to medical control order (situation)
Cardiopulmonary resuscitation discontinued due to do not resuscitate order (situation)
Cardiopulmonary resuscitation discontinued due to return of spontaneous circulation (situation)

On examination - sensory system not examined (situation)
On examination - central nervous system not examined (situation)
Ear, nose and throat examination not performed (situation)
Special cardiovascular system test not done (situation)
Special gastrointestinal tract test not done (situation)
Radiographic imaging procedure not carried out (situation)
No antenatal care: subject unaware of pregnancy (situation)
Antenatal blood group screening not done (situation)
360 degree sweep of cervix not performed (situation)
Administration of medication not done due to contraindication (situation)
Thrombolytic agent not administered because contraindicated (situation)
No chemotherapy AND/OR radiation therapy prior to lymphadenectomy (situation)
Determination of pattern of resistance to antiviral agent not done (situation)
Delayed hypersensitivity skin test for histoplasmin not done (situation)
Patient assessment for procedure not done
Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor not indicated (situation)
Angiotensin II receptor antagonist not indicated (situation)
Selective estrogen receptor modulator not indicated (situation)
Combined calcium and vitamin D3 preparation not indicated (situation)
Dual X-ray absorptiometry scan not indicated (situation)
Referral to cardiac rehabilitation program not indicated (situation)
Referral to heart failure exercise program not indicated (situation)
Testing for Ebola virus not indicated (situation)
Alpha-fetoprotein gene blood test not wanted (situation)

Patient non-compliant - refused access to services (situation)

Refused referral to minor ailments clinic (situation)
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening test declined (situation)
Referral to specialist alcohol treatment service declined by patient (situation)
Ankle brachial pressure index test declined (situation)
Influenza A virus subtype H1N1 vaccination declined (situation)
History taking of sexual orientation declined (situation)
Routine enquiry about domestic abuse declined (situation)
Refusal of treatment by patient against dental advice (situation)
Referral to erectile dysfunction clinic declined (situation)
Referral to cardiac rehabilitation program declined (situation)
Referral to heart failure exercise program declined (situation)
Vaginal birth after previous cesarean section refused (situation)
Transfusion of blood product refused for religious reason (situation)
Medication therapy management recommendation refused by prescriber (situation)
Medication therapy management recommendation refused by patient (situation)
Ear nose and throat disease treatment stopped (situation)
Endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography not completed due to anatomical derangements from previous surgery (situation)
